rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Bulgarian veterinary authorities will cull 40,000 laying hens in the southeastern village of Krivo Pole after a bird flu outbreak was confirmed at an industrial farm there, the fifth since the start of the year, the food safety agency said late on Friday.

Bulgarian veterinary authorities will cull 40,000 laying hens in the southeastern village of Krivo Pole after a bird flu outbreak was confirmed at an industrial farm there, the fifth since the start of the year, the food safety agency said late on Friday.

rationale: 'will cull' is a containment verb; containment neutralises scale unless vivid language is added.

rationale: The segment contains no loaded rhetorical question.
